timeline.bodyText:
Would maybe be easier to have message-top and message-bottom, with the ability to leave either of them blank?
That way you convert 3 settings into 2 (remove enabled & atTop, keep message-top and message-bottom), it gives more flexibility for people trying to configure it, and it's (maybe?) easier to code the condition.
timeline.author: Pablete1234

timeline.bodyText: Can we have a player setting to disable scoreboard messages?
timeline.author: Pablete1234

replies.bodyText: This wouldn't be possible with the way sidebars are currently rendered. The sidebar doesn't know which player is viewing it, only the player's team.
